Name: Zithoek
Review Text:
I recommend this cozy cafe to everyone who would like to be treated with respect. And of course who doesn't like eating delicious cakes and hot coffee!!
By far, one of the best orange cakes I have had in Holland.

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: Little gem in Amsterdam-Noord. Stumbled upon this place after going bouldering with a friend. Tiny cafe/espressobar with great coffee, a cheerful and welcoming owner and a very homely atmosphere. If you want a good espresso or some great ‚Ä¶

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: Great coffee! The gentleman behind the counter is very friendly :) Nice and cosy inside.

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: The ZITHOEK couldn't be named anything else. It is a cute corner where you can sit and chat, inside and out, with an incredible cup of coffee made especially for you. Michael is hands down one of the best baristas I've come across in my ‚Ä¶

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: A very friendly cafe, where clients and owner know each others' first names. Great coffee and loved the cakes too. There is just a positive and friendly vibe about this cafe, which is also new apparently. I have north amsterdam embraces it and supports it!

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: No pretensions. Great coffee. Awesome apple pie. And almost forgot: lovely staff. If you‚Äôre around drop by.

Name: Zithoek

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: Little gem in Amsterdam Noord. Excellent coffee, relaxed atmosphere and friendly staff. Highly recommended when in Noord.

Name: Zithoek

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: My favorite coffee shop in all of Amsterdam. A neighborhood spot, friendly, and amazing coffee. Must visit!

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: This is by far the best coffee place in Amsterdam Noord. Michael is a super friendly host who treats his guest so well and his cakes and coffee are delicious. Zithoek has a living room vibe. It is not too busy and you chat and connect very easily with other people  who are enjoying their coffee. We love it!!!

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: Really amazing coffee and lattes. Loved the room behind the counter with a kids table -- the crayons kept our three year old entertained while we enjoyed our coffees.

Name: Zithoek

Name: Zithoek
Review Text: I rarely leave reviews, but this time I was impressed! GREAT COFFEE, maar echt! Unpretentious, laid back and super welcoming owner. Great vibe, taarts and sunny terrace until late! A must when in Noord
